Installing diceroll¶

Local Installation¶

Installing diceroll 2.2 is as easy as always. Just copy diceroll.py into the same folder your code happens to be in.

Then add this line at (or near) the top of your code:

from diceroll import roll

Packaged Installation¶

If your code setup is different, in that you like to keep your function modules in a folder separate from your main code, you could copy diceroll.py into that folder.

Say you have a folder called library, and assuming you have an __init__.py inside it, just copy diceroll.py into your library folder and add this line near the top of your code:

from library.diceroll import roll
